meanings.definition: The quality or state of being high.
meanings.sent2: The highness of the tree made it stand out in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The highness of the cake towered over the other desserts.
meanings.sent4: The highness of the skyscraper reached towards the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The highness of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A title of honor used when addressing or referring to a royal or noble person.
meanings.sent1: Your highness, may I present the royal decree.
meanings.sent2: The queen's highness was evident in her regal attire.
meanings.sent3: The highness of the cat demanded attention from all in the room.
meanings.sent4: The highness of the sun in the sky signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The highness of the castle walls spoke of centuries of history and tradition.
